title: Sans serif with round edges
content:
Hi,  
Can anybody recognize what the type in this poster from Bosnian designer Zoran Lucic is? Seems awfully familiar, but I can't seem to put a name on it.

Thanks!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317125845im_/http:/typophile.com/files/kleinekaiser_4048.jpg)

Font: 

 Engineering Plot 

Solved By: 

 [fvilanakis](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317125845/http:/typophile.com/user/176276 "View user profile.")
author: Nicord

comments.content: It looks like **[Engineering Plot](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317125845/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Dafont-1&ffam=Engineering%20Plot%20-%20Light&fid=d7f11ca1620053b709a5fc0a61bcb6a2&fsize=48&text=MB13%20DER%20KLEINE%20KAISER&wrap=2)** free font by David Kovalchik

Looks like something close to [this previous discussion about Leroy Lettering machine](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317125845/http:/typophile.com/node/79271), very close to **[Engineering Plot](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317125845/http:/www.dafont.com/engineering-plot.font)** (if not matching).  
Some alternatives : [Planscribe](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317125845/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/nicksfonts/planscribe-nf), [Leroy Lettering Light Beta 01](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317125845/http:/www.fontspace.com/character/leroyletteringlightbeta01), [Gravur Condensed](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317125845/http:/lineto.com/The%20Fonts/Font%20Categories/Text%20Fonts/Gravur%20Condensed), [Rendering](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317125845/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/jnlevine/rendering), [Simpliciter Sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317125845/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/larstornqvist/simpliciter-sans), [Gordon](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317125845/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/gordon/), [Register Sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317125845/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/btn/register-sans-btn), [Primer Print](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317125845/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/larabie/primer-print), [Report](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317125845/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/typodermic/report), [Oxymoron](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317125845/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/bedoodle/oxymoron), [TGL 0-16](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317125845/http:/www.dafont.com/tgl-0-16.font)

EDIT: Fivos is confirming Engineering Plot

Yes, I think that's it.

Thanks a lot!
And thanks for the alternatives, Ryuk. I think it is indeed Engineering Plot, but those look very interesting too.
